name: Spaghetti Carbonara
steps: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente
Fry pancetta in a pan until crispy
Beat eggs with grated parmesan and black pepper
Drain pasta and mix with pancetta, then add egg mixture off heat
Toss quickly to create creamy sauce without scrambling eggs
description: A classic Italian pasta dish with a rich, creamy sauce made from eggs, cheese, pancetta, and black pepper.
nutritionBenefits: High in protein from eggs and pancetta. Provides carbohydrates for energy and calcium from parmesan cheese.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for 30 minutes
Grill or pan-fry chicken pieces until cooked
Sauté onions, garlic, and ginger until soft
Add spices and tomatoes, cook until thick
Add cream and chicken, simmer for 10 minutes
description: A popular curry dish featuring tender chicken in a creamy, spiced tomato-based sauce.
nutritionBenefits: Rich in protein from chicken. Contains antioxidants from spices like turmeric and provides essential vitamins from tomatoes.

name: Kung Pao Chicken
steps: Cut chicken into bite-sized pieces and marinate
Add bell peppers and cook for 2 minutes
description: A spicy, stir-fried Chinese dish with chicken, peanuts, vegetables, and chili peppers.
nutritionBenefits: High protein from chicken. Peanuts provide healthy fats and protein. Bell peppers are rich in vitamin C.

name: Margherita Pizza
steps: Roll out pizza dough on baking sheet
Bake for 12-15 minutes until crust is golden
description: A classic Italian pizza with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil on a thin crust.
nutritionBenefits: Provides carbohydrates from dough. Mozzarella offers calcium and protein. Tomatoes are rich in lycopene.

name: Butter Chicken
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices
description: Creamy, mildly spiced curry with tender chicken in a rich tomato and butter sauce.
nutritionBenefits: High protein from chicken. Healthy fats from butter. Cream adds calcium and vitamins.

name: Sweet and Sour Pork
steps: Cut pork into cubes and coat with cornstarch
Deep fry until golden and crispy
description: A popular Chinese dish featuring crispy fried pork with a tangy sweet and sour sauce.
nutritionBenefits: Good source of protein from pork. Bell peppers provide vitamin C. Pineapple adds vitamin C and fiber.

name: Eggs Benedict
steps: Poach eggs in simmering water with vinegar
Make hollandaise sauce with egg yolks and butter
description: A classic brunch dish with poached eggs, Canadian bacon, and hollandaise sauce on English muffins.
nutritionBenefits: High in protein from eggs. Provides healthy fats. Good source of B vitamins.

name: French Toast
steps: Whisk eggs, milk, vanilla, and cinnamon
Fry in butter until golden brown
description: A sweet breakfast treat made by dipping bread in an egg mixture and frying until golden.
nutritionBenefits: Provides carbohydrates for energy. Eggs add protein. Cinnamon has antioxidant properties.

name: Tiramisu
steps: Separate eggs and beat yolks with sugar
Beat whites to stiff peaks and fold in
description: A classic Italian dessert with coffee-soaked ladyfingers and creamy mascarpone.
nutritionBenefits: Provides calcium from mascarpone. Eggs offer protein. Moderate caffeine from espresso.

name: Gulab Jamun
steps: Mix khoya, flour, and baking powder
Make sugar syrup with cardamom and saffron
Soak fried balls in warm syrup
description: Sweet milk-based dumplings soaked in a fragrant sugar syrup, a beloved Indian dessert.
nutritionBenefits: Provides energy from sugar. Khoya offers calcium. Cardamom aids digestion.

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
steps: Mix in flour and baking soda
description: Classic homemade cookies loaded with chocolate chips, perfect for any time of day.
nutritionBenefits: Provides quick energy. Chocolate contains antioxidants. Moderate protein from eggs.

name: Caesar Salad
steps: Make caesar dressing with anchovies, garlic, egg yolks
Whisk in olive oil and lemon juice
Top with croutons and more parmesan
description: A crisp, refreshing salad with romaine lettuce, creamy caesar dressing, and crunchy croutons.
nutritionBenefits: Low in calories. High in vitamins from lettuce. Protein from anchovies and eggs.

name: Pad Thai
description: A popular Thai stir-fried noodle dish with a perfect balance of sweet, sour, and savory flavors.
nutritionBenefits: Good source of protein from shrimp. Provides carbohydrates from noodles. Peanuts add healthy fats.

name: Tom Kha Gai
steps: Simmer lemongrass, galangal, and lime leaves in broth
Add chicken and cook until tender
Season with fish sauce and lime juice
description: A fragrant Thai coconut soup with chicken, lemongrass, and aromatic herbs.
nutritionBenefits: High protein from chicken. Coconut milk provides healthy fats. Rich in vitamins from herbs.

name: Chicken Fajitas
steps: Slice chicken into strips and marinate
Serve with lime, sour cream, and salsa
description: Sizzling strips of seasoned chicken with peppers and onions, served in warm tortillas.
nutritionBenefits: High protein from chicken. Bell peppers provide vitamin C. Whole grain tortillas offer fiber.

name: Guacamole
steps: Season with lime juice and salt
description: A fresh, creamy dip made from mashed avocados, perfect with tortilla chips.
nutritionBenefits: High in healthy monounsaturated fats. Rich in fiber and potassium. Contains vitamin E.
